hero.title: Nina Moore
hero.subtitle: Initiatory work for visionary women at thresholds of change
hero.description: I work with women navigating deep inner transitions — moments when old patterns, identities, or ways of living no longer hold, and something new is asking to emerge.
hero.statement1: This work is about meeting yourself honestly.
hero.statement2: Listening deeply. And integrating what is already moving through you.

invitation.title: You may find yourself here if…
invitation.intro: Something is shifting, even if you can't fully name it yet.
invitation.subtitle: You may recognize yourself in some of these:
lines: You are intuitive, sensitive, creative — and feel blocked or stuck.
You are at a crossroads: a life transition, awakening, or deep inner change.
You've outgrown old roles, relationships, or identities.
You sense there is more trying to come through, and you're ready to listen.
You want depth without bypassing, forcing, or performing transformation.
invitation.closing: This work is for women who feel the call to step into themselves more fully — with honesty, presence, and care.

howIWork.title: How I work
howIWork.intro1: Every woman arrives with her own history, rhythm, and readiness.
howIWork.intro2: There is no formula or script.
howIWork.intro3: My role is to offer attuned presence, clear reflection, and a grounded space where what is emerging can be met and integrated.
howIWork.pillarsIntro: The work rests on three core pillars:

pillars.title: Embodied presence
pillars.description: We work with the body — breath, sensation, and the nervous system — not only conversation. Real change happens when insight is felt and lived, not just understood.

pillars.title: Honest reflection
pillars.description: I offer clear, respectful mirrors. I name patterns, ask precise questions, and support truth-telling without judgment. Growth requires honesty more than comfort.

pillars.title: Integration
pillars.description: Insights are brought into daily life through practical steps and gentle integration, so change becomes lived and sustained.

sessionEntails.title: What a session can hold
sessionEntails.intro: Each session is shaped by what you bring in that moment. Work together may include:

items.title: Deep exploration and integration
items.description: A safe space for meeting what is present

items.title: Emotional and energetic clearing
items.description: Releasing what is stuck or blocked

items.title: Clarifying inner conflicts or patterns
items.description: Seeing clearly what has been hidden

items.title: Meeting and integrating parts of yourself
Nervous-system-aware pacing
items.description: Sessions are relational, responsive, and rooted in what is alive for you

workTypes.title: Areas of work
workTypes.intro: Women come to this work carrying many kinds of thresholds, including:

items.title: Psychedelic integration
items.description: Medicine ceremonies, challenging experiences, self-led journeys

items.title: Relationships
items.description: Intimacy, boundaries, shadow work, sacred partnership

items.title: Creative flow
items.description: Reconnecting with joy, trust, and expression

waysToWork.title: Ways to work together
waysToWork.intro: We always begin with a conversation and move at a pace that respects your nervous system and readiness.

discoveryCall.title: Free Discovery Call
discoveryCall.description: A 20-minute conversation to explore what you're navigating and whether this work feels aligned.

sessions.title: Single Session
sessions.description: A one-off session for grounding, clarity, or support through a specific moment or transition.

fourSessions.title: The 4-Session Cycle
fourSessions.description: A deeper rhythm that allows for continuity, integration, and real movement.
fourSessions.pacing: Scheduled at a pace that supports integration.

waysToWork.closing: Further work — including longer containers, ongoing integration support, or retreats — is explored naturally through conversation.

thisWorkIsFor.title: This work is for women who
lines: Are ready to meet themselves honestly.
Want guidance without being told who to be.
Are willing to practice and integrate between sessions.
Feel stable enough to engage in deep inner work.
thisWorkIsFor.closing2: I'm here to guide and support the process.

about.title: About Nina
about.bio: I have been guiding this work for over ten years. I meet women heart to heart — with presence, honesty, and respect for each woman's rhythm and capacity. My approach weaves embodied awareness, intuitive insight, and grounded integration.
about.languages: Sessions are offered in English, Spanish, and French.

contact.title: Begin the conversation
contact.intro: If you feel drawn to work together, start with a free discovery call.
exploreItems: whether this feels aligned for both of us
contact.boundary: Messages are read with care and replied to thoughtfully.

form.name: Your Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell me what brings you here...
